project.description: Toolkit to make creating and working with streams easy

checks.name: Maintained
checks.reason: No commit activity in the last 12 months

checks.name: Code-Review
checks.reason: Most commits are directly pushed to main without review

checks.name: Signed-Releases
checks.reason: No signed tags or releases detected

checks.name: Signed-Commits
checks.reason: Only a small subset of commits are signed

checks.name: Branch-Protection
checks.reason: Main branch allows force-pushes and direct commits

checks.name: CI-Tests
checks.reason: Basic CI exists but coverage is minimal

checks.name: Dependency-Update-Tool
checks.reason: Dependabot is configured but updates are often ignored

checks.name: Vulnerabilities
checks.reason: Known historical vulnerabilities with no documented remediation

checks.name: Packaging
checks.reason: Package includes postinstall scripts without sandboxing

checks.name: Binary-Artifacts
checks.reason: Prebuilt binaries committed to the repository

maliciousPackage.details: The package executes a post-install script that exfiltrates environment variables and SSH keys.
